amp.admin.ndd.program:title: NDD Program Manager
amp.admin.ndd.program:click-save: Click the Save icon to save the added data row
amp.admin.ndd.program:confirm-remove-row: Are you sure you want to remove this mapping? (remember to click Save All button to confirm your changes).
amp.admin.ndd.program:validation_error_1: Error: Can't save changes until all programs have been selected.
amp.admin.ndd.program:validation_error_2: Error: Destination programs can't be mapped more than one time.
amp.admin.ndd.program:warning_on_change_: If you change the Source Program or the Destination Program the existing mappings will be deleted, are you sure you want to continue?
amp.admin.ndd.program:validation_error_5: Error: Source Program and Destination Program must be different.
amp.admin.ndd.program:warning_on_change_: Warning: The new Destination Program will be removes from all activities.
amp.admin.ndd.program:confirm-change-des: Are you sure you want to : The new Destination Program will be removes from all activities.
amp.admin.ndd.program:page-title: Aid Management Platform - NDD Mappings Manager
amp.admin.ndd.program:button-update-acti: Are you sure you want to update all activities with the current mappings?  (This process could take several minutes)
